column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is the tricky part. Common Bond does have a parking lot for its customers (around 2 dozen or so spots)
column2: but it can fill up really quickly during rush hour. You can park on the street of any of the neighborhoods
column3: but sometimes those fill up quickly as well. Don't give up though! I promise you the food is worth it. Also
column4: make sure you DO NOT park in Common Bond's parking lot after hours
column5: or if you're not going to eat there. They will tow you.
